title: Software Engineer
description: We are looking for a software engineer to join our growing team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining our web applications using modern technologies.
requirements: 5+ years of experience with JavaScript, React, Node.js. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
benefits: Health insurance, 401k, flexible work schedule, remote work options

title: Marketing Manager
description: Join our dynamic marketing team as a Marketing Manager. You will lead marketing campaigns and strategies to grow our client base in the Central Valley.
requirements: 3+ years of marketing experience, knowledge of digital marketing tools, excellent communication skills.
benefits: Health insurance, paid time off, professional development budget

title: Sales Representative
description: We are seeking an energetic sales representative to join our team. You will be responsible for building relationships with clients and driving sales growth.
requirements: Previous sales experience preferred, strong communication skills, self-motivated.
benefits: Base salary plus commission, health benefits, company car allowance

title: Customer Service Rep
description: Provide excellent customer service support to our clients via phone, email, and chat. Handle inquiries, resolve issues, and maintain customer satisfaction.
requirements: High school diploma, excellent communication skills, customer service experience preferred.
benefits: Flexible schedule, training provided, growth opportunities

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze business data to provide insights and recommendations. Create reports and dashboards to support decision-making processes.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field. Experience with SQL, Excel, and data visualization tools.
benefits: Competitive hourly rate, potential for permanent position, professional development
